MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY5 postcode area of Lochgelly, affecting properties in Paul Street and surrounding areas. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1:00pm due to an underground cable fault outside Paul street and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:28pm on Wednesday, 03 February 2021
